ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They are given the choicest sealed wine to drink,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They will be served the choicest wine, sealed
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They will be served a drink of the finest sealed wine,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They will be given pure wine out of sealed containers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They will be given pure wine to drink, which is kept preserved, sealed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They will be given to drink of pure sealed Rahiq.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They are made to quaff of a pure drink that is sealed (to others).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: as they are given to drink of a wine sealed
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They are given to drink of a pure wine, sealed,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They will be given a drink of pure wine, sealed,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They will be given to drink of pure wine, sealed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They will be served with a sealed pure wine,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Their thirst will be slaked with Pure Wine sealed:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They will be given to drink pure sealed wine.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They shall be given to drink of a wine that is sealed,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They will be given to drink a sealed wine.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They will be given to drink [pure] wine [which was] sealed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [83:25] as they are given to drink a nectar, a wine free of any impurities, [that is] sealed, in its vessel, none other than them breaking its seal,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: They are given to drink) in Paradise (of a pure wine, sealed) mixed,
